description: This file contains C source code implementing the findEnumForLabel function, which searches for a string label within an array of strings and returns its index or a default value.

methods.name: int findEnumForLabel(const char * needle,const char * const haystack[],size_t haystackLength)
methods.description: Searches for a label within a string array and returns its index or INVALID_ENUM if not found.

ctags.name: findEnumForLabel
